titleStmt.title: By the mayor, to the alderman of the ward of [blank] whereas I have received a rule made yesterday by His Majesties Court of Kings-Bench, whereby (upon great complaint made to the said court, that squibs and crackers are frequently thrown into coaches passing the streets of this city ...)
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Tulse, Henry, Sir, d. 1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Roycroft, Printer to this Honourable City,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Guildhall Library (London, England).
